assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The UK Biobank study was conducted under generic approval from the National Health Services’ National Research Ethics Service. The present analyses were approved by the Human Investigations Committee at Columbia University (institutional review board protocol number IRB-AAAS3494) and Yale University (2000026836).
